Resolved Question Show me another » Can someone help me...Need help on resume? Ive only worked at mcdonalds for 2 years as a cashier and i need help trying to write my career objective as a sales associate, i want to work as a sales associate and i dont know how to write a resume for it, examples would be great! Thanks! I dont have any experience in sales except for very little when we needed to sale our pies and cookies or parfaits before their experation time. Or when we needed to sale our new products, but other than that i have no experience in sales associate. 8 months ago Report Abuse by Talking Hat Member since: November 03, 2006 Total points: 12,694 (Level 6) Add Contact Block
